original_title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Ed Solomon
overview: Ed Solomon, screenwriter for blockbusters such as Bill and Ted's Excellent Adventure and Men in Black, sits down for an in-depth interview about life in the Hollywood fast lane, from breaking into the business to having a script produced. Entertaining, informative and candid, Solomon reveals what the life of a working industry screenwriter is really like in both television and film.
tagline: An interview series that gives unprecedented looks into the lives of working screenwriters.
title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Ed Solomon
